entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
